price: 「今日は貧者*があなた方と共に、そこ（農園）に入ることがあってはならない」と。
arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
